messages.content: If you don't vote then you can't be heard and the UK will continue with the same old parties and politicians. UKIP want to bring real change to this country and our volunteers are working hard in the South Derbyshire area to win local and national elections in 2015.

mentions.tacticalSituation: UKIP support has grown massively in recent years and UKIP came first in the last election in this area. If you vote for us in 2015 we can win again and put common sense politicians into the Council & Westminster.

contactInformation.address:
